rooms.description: A wide entrance with a wheelchair-accessible ramp leading into the living area
Open concept living space with abundant natural light and ample seating arrangements.
Adjacent to the kitchen for easy service. Includes a dining table designed for accessibility.
Fully equipped, wheelchair accessible with lower countertops and lever handles.
Secluded corner library for joint family reading; shelves designed to accommodate varying heights.

openings.description: Accessibly designed door with automatic mechanism.
Spacious balcony attached for relaxation and fresh air, following Vastu guidelines to face the auspicious directions.

rooms.description: Spacious room with a balcony facing the north-east direction as per Vastu for prosperity; accessible design features including wide doorways.
Well-appointed bedroom with its own balcony ensuring privacy and adherence to Vastu principles.
Dedicated gym area for joint family members; equipment placement designed for accessibility and safety.

openings.description: Spacious balcony with easy wheelchair access.
Spacious balcony ensuring privacy and natural ventilation.
